front.title: IEEE Standard for Pole-Mounted Equipment--Enclosure Integrity

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: An error has been identified in the 2010 published version of IEEE Std C57.12.31(TM)-2010. The number of cycles included in one of the corrosion tests is not correct. This error needs to be corrected which is a critical requirement of the standard.
